Summary: Menu bar:Site menu on mobile doesn't collapse when swiping left
Description: STR:1.Open the application.2.Open the menu bar.3.Close the menu with a swipe to the left.
Result: The menu bar close with a swipe to the left
Environment: Android 10; Redmi Note 7 Build/QKQ1.190910.002; Google Chrome 100.0.4896.79
